comments.author: Taylor Hunt
comments.message: Not that you'd want to, but Android has its own version of Comic Sans; "Coming Soon". Does that change its support in the intro?

replies.author: zachleat
replies.message:
Oh, interesting. I see Coming Soon here, is it supported on any Android devices? https://fonts.google.com/sp...

I see Casual has some Android support, is that what you mean? http://fontfamily.io/Casual

replies.author: Taylor Hunt
replies.message: It appears to show up sporadically: I can see it in certain versions of Android's system fonts: https://github.com/mpeck12/...

replies.author: Taylor Hunt
replies.message: I see it in some versions of Android's system fonts, which makes it hard to nail down: https://github.com/mpeck12/...

replies.author: Taylor Hunt
replies.message: It looks like "Casual" is what it's aliased to, yeah.

replies.author: zachleat
replies.message: Great, thanks for the sources! Unfortunately Android aliases are kind of a mess ðŸ˜­
